title: Taming Kane, Claiming Mia 3: A BWWM Romance
description: Mia has a serious dilemma…Spending time with Kane has proven that he is not the toxic bachelor Tinley said he was. Now that Mia knows that he really is a man of integrity that loves her to no end, she has to decide how she is going to get out of writing the "toxic bachelor" article and explain to Kane that she is not the woman he initially thought she was. Except every time an opportunity presents itself, she can’t find the words to tell him that she has deceived him.Will Kane be able to love the real Mia once she can no longer hide her deception, or will their happily ever after be over before it officially begins?
author: Nichole Lynn
